Plot: Seekers of wisdom and beauty include lovely lost women, eccentric wizards and man-eating melancholy deodands. Twk-men ride dragonflies and trade information for salt. There are monsters and demons. Each being is morally ambiguous: the evil are charming, the good are dangerous.
Characters: Guyal, Liane, Turjan, T'sais, Ulan Dhor, Pandelume, T'sain
